physical_appearance: The image shows a black-and-white photograph. It is rectangular and it features a body of water and the seashore. There are trees in the distance, along with a fence that extends from the shore into the water. A sailboat can be seen in the distance.
title_text: Seashore Photography Album (donation from Anthony Robert Saint Claire)
subject_terms_1: bodies of water (natural) seashores natural landscapes
subject_terms_2: Black-and-white photography Bodies of water Seashore Landscape photography Landscapes
